ScriptKitt3h i will battle you what are your terms?

ScriptKitt3h i will battle you what are your terms?

Your warship are ready already?

kind of.... I have an 88 ton and a 156 ton, both of which are underarmored, have ineffective and basic SRBs, and lack fuel range. BUT i must begin somewhere. So yes, I am ready.

The 156 ton Thresher... it has more fuel than a Drek, but has selective hybrid armor to protect it, based on importance of parts.

kind of.... I have an 88 ton and a 156 ton, both of which are underarmored, have ineffective and basic SRBs, and lack fuel range. BUT i must begin somewhere. So yes, I am ready.

The 156 ton Thresher... it has more fuel than a Drek, but has selective hybrid armor to protect it, based on importance of parts.

http://i.imgur.com/fJtixhU.png

Liking the battleship for sure.

ScriptKitt3h i will battle you what are your terms?

You can make the rules, if you'd like to. However, I do want to have the same rule me and War Eagle did about taking breaks if need be, since I'll be away from home until Monday.

Liking the battleship for sure.

Yeah, im moving away from heavy armor and more for range. Before, I had focused on "stay alive" as #1 priority, but not i see its worthless when people can just out-fly your battleships, if you have poor range. And my missiles are good enough to damage, for the time being, so Im not going to worry about that yet.

ScriptKitt3h, sure, how about max 600 tonnes, or 5 ships, around Eeloo, No K-Drives, Turn based, winner is with last ship standing and powered, fueled, moveable, and armed. We can also agree on a truce or withdrawl. Ships are limited to Eeloo's SOI.

Yeah, im moving away from heavy armor and more for range. Before, I had focused on "stay alive" as #1 priority, but not i see its worthless when people can just out-fly your battleships, if you have poor range. And my missiles are good enough to damage, for the time being, so Im not going to worry about that yet.

Hey I have been working on guided SRBs as my new heavy weapon (non judgement type), Think you can test them out to see what I did wrong in my last battle?

Yeah, im moving away from heavy armor and more for range. Before, I had focused on "stay alive" as #1 priority, but not i see its worthless when people can just out-fly your battleships, if you have poor range. And my missiles are good enough to damage, for the time being, so Im not going to worry about that yet.

One good technique is to use wing armor for cargo bays/hangars/ammo storage, and metal plate armor for your engines, fuel and crew pods.

Also i-beams work great for missiles since they shred wing armor and work 60/40 on plate armor.
I Beams... shudder. The bane of armor... and engine fuel tanks.

I Beams... shudder. The bane of armor... and engine fuel tanks.

Ok... now go and look at what I did to PGS Trinity in my last battle. 20 I-beams fired like an auto-shotgun.

Ok... now go and look at what I did to PGS Trinity in my last battle. 20 I-beams fired like an auto-shotgun.

Was that .5 body, with sepratrons, and girders? I gotta try that...

Was that .5 body, with sepratrons, and girders? I gotta try that...

Well I may have to go back and add I beams to my missiles

Well I may have to go back and add I beams to my missiles

I've started an arms race... *evil laugh*

I've started an arms race... *evil laugh*

EhhÃ¢â‚¬Â¦this sorta thing happens all the time

oh, ive done it. Ive done it. The Razor. It's perfect. It's 108 tons, same as a Drek, yet its armor is dense and well angled. Good luck getting through THIS! She has 24 half-tanks of fuel, meaning she's got range too. This new "Edgy Armor" means it will bounce a lot of shots while keeping armor count low. And she carries 12 .5 HV semi-guided mini missiles and 3 SRBs.

IE, it's perfect.
Your armour is super weird! lol

oh, ive done it. Ive done it. The Razor. It's perfect. It's 108 tons, same as a Drek, yet its armor is dense and well angled. Good luck getting through THIS! She has 24 half-tanks of fuel, meaning she's got range too. This new "Edgy Armor" means it will bounce a lot of shots while keeping armor count low. And she carries 12 .5 HV semi-guided mini missiles and 3 SRBs.

http://i.imgur.com/JuI53fh.png

http://i.imgur.com/Br3CADT.png

http://i.imgur.com/M4rZ4zN.png

IE, it's perfect.

Honey....get the Requiem. We got a live one here

IE, it's perfect.

The armor could also potentially act as a shot trap like the turret mantle on the first panthers did...shermans literally just had to bounce shells off of it into the weak top armor for kills lol

Definitely liking the creativity though! looking forward to seeing how it performs in battle!

God of the kraken... You just gave me some... ideas.

Good ideas.

HAHAHHA!!!! 'Descends into dark laboratory'

'IT'S ALIVE'

actually, i was testing the Thresher and I noticed the SRB did LESS damage when it hit the funnel point, so i tried to make a ship out of that I think it will soak up more damage than normal, because of the much smaller area. But we will see.

Evil laugh

Shroud-armor UNSC-destroyer MK 1.5 with Ares missiles armed with FERNIS MK 0.5 warheads. Weighs around 120 tons and 400-500 parts due to complex structure. Propulsion is four thrust vectoring non-nuclear engines to address HIGHCOM's concern for the lack of maneuverability and acceleration.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

With unarmed ares missiles. Warheads were added later.

Prototype (unproven): https://www.dropbox.com/s/7pdyhyfg0n0phyt/UNSC%20Sky%20Breaker.craft

Yeah! Watch it go BANG BANG!!!
